alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Monroe (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 19 at 2:34PM EST until January 20 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Bland and Giles Counties. In West Virginia, Monroe and Eastern Greenbrier Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight EST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sub-zero wind chills are expected again Saturday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
